column5: On Discovery chanel, at 9pm. A look back at the life of Capt Phil Harris from Deadliest Catch. He was a special man.
I'm watching it right now....what a life....
ya real short,burning the candle at both ends cigs and redbull!
Watching the last few episodes of Season 6 last year was one of the most emotional things I've ever seen on TV.

Absolutely.He was a mans man, a fishermans heart never stops beating.Never met him, but i felt i knew him for years, and the wife and i cried like babies watching the show where he passed.Even now, watching this show, i feel the pain of emotion. Kinda like something else we all feel in here....eh?
